thread.title: Car Infotainment Systems Distract Even with Voice Commands
thread.title_full: Car Infotainment Systems Distract Even with Voice Commands

title: Car Infotainment Systems Distract Even with Voice Commands
text:
Car Infotainment Systems Distract Even with Voice Commands By The Associated Press In this May 14, 2014, file photo, Ted Cardenas, a marketing vice president with Pioneer Electronics, demonstrates the new Apple CarPlay powered by Pioneer, featuring Siri voice control, while navigating through the Financial District in San Francisco. Credit: AP Photo/Eric Risberg 
Car infotainment systems that use voice commands may let drivers keep their hands on the wheel, but they're still highly distracting. 
From The Associated Press
